\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 87965}

\subsection*{I'm Hooked}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Kuma}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated & insufflated & Pharms - Bupropion & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 3 mg & oral & Pharms - Clonazepam & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 295.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Ok I got prescribed this stuff because I supposedly have depression with phsychotic features. I experimented with insuffalating it before here and there. but when I got this script I decided to snort some, I turned on some music on the `puter and crushed away. my mood was completely neutral at this time. 



Right as I snort the first line I get a lovely burn\ldots I loved the burn , then the numbness. I felt like i could conqer the world. And mind you , this stuff DOES have reinforcing effects, cuzz 15 later I wanted another two rails. then I played video games for like 30 minutes and wanted another two rails. 



I felt totally euphoric, but I noticed my heart started beating a little hard and remembered the thing about the siezure threshold so I took 3mg of klonopin sublingually to fight any convulsivness. then I did another 2 rails. a rush of euphoria gave me goos bumps vision is a lil weird. its not numbing any more at this point. 



i feel like i have to do something. i clean my room spotless. i do another two  rails. then i wash my nostrils out with water for better insuffalation\ldots i'm tweaking. i feel like i need it. i've been playing video games and snorting line after line like a tweaker for 2 days..

\end{document}
